guides.title: Basic Port Scan
guides.description: Scan open ports on a target host.
guides.explanation: Uses SYN scan to check ports 1-1000 on the target IP.

guides.title: OS Detection
guides.description: Identify the operating system of a target.
guides.explanation: Probes the target to determine its OS and version.

guides.title: Service Version Detection
guides.description: Detect versions of services running on open ports.
guides.explanation: Identifies service versions (e.g., Apache 2.4.7) on open ports.

guides.title: Aggressive Scan
guides.description: Perform a comprehensive scan including OS and service detection.
guides.explanation: Combines OS detection, version detection, script scanning, and traceroute.

guides.title: Scan Multiple Hosts
guides.description: Scan a range of IP addresses.
